Another cult classic you might enjoy is 'Fight Club'. This thought-provoking movie, featuring stars like Brad Pitt and Edward Norton, tells the story of an underground fight club that leads to a surprising and dramatic transformation for its members. Both films are true works of art within their unique genres!
